WHAT_IS.HARDCORE_MEDIA_BIGGEST_SHOW: Hardcore Media is the world's most popular martial arts reality show. Every tournament is streamed on YouTube and gathers a multi-million global audience.</br></br>The HFC platform has already gained popularity in the CIS market and is actively expanding into Asia and the Middle East.

ECOSYSTEM.FIGHTING_WORLD: Объединяет мир единоборств с миром цифровых технологий.
ECOSYSTEM.PRIVATE_PARTICIPATION: Takе part in the filming of tournaments and events.
ECOSYSTEM.ABILITY_INFLUENCE: Influence fighters rating, the league table draw, and drafts.
ECOSYSTEM.ACCESS_EXCLUSIVE_CONTENT: Exclusive content: fights not included in live episodes, private fights, behind-the-scenes footage, full fighter profiles, and more.
ECOSYSTEM.BONUS: Contribute to a multi-million audience media business and receive a range of bonuses.
ECOSYSTEM.ATTENTION: Get the target audience interested in your product and its projected development. Take advantage of the combat sports popularity growth and digital technologies.
ECOSYSTEM.PARTICIPATION_IN_BATTLE: Participate in fights as a title sponsor, media partner, or philanthropist.
ECOSYSTEM.OWN_BRAND: Strengthen your brand in the media through collaboration with the Hardcore Fighting Championship.
ECOSYSTEM.SCALING_BUSINESS: Scale your business due to international media coverage.

SIMPLE.MOBILE_APP: Hardapp Mobile App. Connect to the HFC Universe!

HOW_WORK.UNIQUE_OPPORTUNITY: The platform members get access to unique benefits. Using HardCoin tokens, they will be able to:
HOW_WORK.ADD_FIGHTER: Add a fighter to the list of tournament participants.
HOW_WORK.PRIVATE_MEET: Arrange a personal meeting with a fighter.
HOW_WORK.DEVELOPMENT_PROJECT: Participate in development and expansion projects around the world.
HOW_WORK.SUPPORT_FIGHTERS: Support their favourite fighters and interact with them.
HOW_WORK.COLLECT_NFT: Collect unique NFTs from the Knockdown and Knockout series.

PROFITABLE.OFFICIAL_CURRENCY: HardCoin is the official digital currency of the platform. It has a fixed emission, that simplifies all financial interactions for fans and customers. Therefore:
PROFITABLE.COMMUNITY_HARDCORE: The large HardCore community will be motivated to regularly purchase HarcCoin tokens to pay for goods, services, tickets, access to private broadcasts, and other benefits.
PROFITABLE.WHERE_BUY: HardCoin will be the only currency of the NFT marketplace where you can purchase unique products and access various services.
PROFITABLE.COLLECTION_NFT: The NFT collection - includes visuals of the best knockouts, fighter posters, themed event cards, portraits, and collectables of the star fighters, as well as other cryptographic elements - will be regularly updated thereby stimulating additional token purchase
PROFITABLE.USE_TECHNOLOGIES: The use of GameFi + Real Offline technology will allow users to earn tokens even for simple actions such as exchange, subscription, and more. With HardCoin tokens users can vote for the next fight and for HardCore Fighting Championship rule changes.

VIEW.LAUNCHING_INTERNATIONAL_FRANCHISE: Launching an international franchise and holding Hardcore FC partner tournaments around the world.
VIEW.AGENCY_USA: Launch of a betting site in the United States.
VIEW.HARDCORE_TV: Featuring Hardcore FC on national TV channels.
VIEW.FIRST_FIGHTER_CLUB: Opening of the first Hardcore Gym in the chain.
VIEW.CLOTHES: Launch of a clothing line and sports equipment.
VIEW.SPORT_FOOD: Launch of a sports nutrition line.

TEAM.ANATOLIY_TEXT: Businessman, athlete and founder of the Hardcore FC fist fighting league. Founder of the martial arts club Arena Fight Club, owner of the Ultimate Fitness fitness club.
TEAM.EUGENE_TEXT: Business angel, venture investor, co-founder of angelsdeck.com, founder and managing partner of Altergate.vc.
TEAM.GEORGE_TEXT: Technological innovator. Head of Startup Entrepreneurship at the Blockchain Association of Armenia, participant of the Digital Georgia international initiative.
TEAM.KARINA_TEXT: Founder of mobile and web development studio Hilditonn. BA, Lead PM. Technical business consultant.

SUBSCRIBE.WELCOME_TO_LEAGUE: Welcome to the Hardcore FC martial arts league!
SUBSCRIBE.GET_EXCLUSIVE_GOODS: Get exclusive offers, advance ticket sales information, and discounts for HardCoin owners.
SUBSCRIBE.ONE_UNIT: Now you are one with martial arts

ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_2: Marketing campaign and economic model development.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_6: Development of HFC platform’s NFT components.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_7: Launch of PR campaign to support tokenization of the HFC platform.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_8: Development of primary HFC smart contracts.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_13: Development of HFC application’s NFT components.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_15: Holding Hardcore Fighting tournament in Thailand.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_16: Launch of the clothing and sport equipment line.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_17: Hardcore Fighting Championship entry to the US market.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_18: Holding the first HFC fight in the US.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_19: Launch of the international franchise and holding Hardcore Championship partner tournaments.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_20: Expanding of the platform’s functionality to enable paid view of HFC private fights.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_21: Opening of an in-house detailing studio under the Hardcore brand, based on ZTR Performance.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_22: Launch of the «Hardcore Gaming» mobile games series.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_23: The opening of the first fighting club within the Hardcore Gym network, providing personal training with the league's fighters.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_24: Featuring the Hardcore Fighting Championship brand on national TV channels.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_25: Expansion of the HFC platform internal functionality to enable purchasing tickets for HFC fights within the application, expansion of NFT capabilities, expansion of users’ ability to interact with HFC fights grid.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_26: Launch of the sports food line under the Hardcore brand.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_27: Production of energy drinks under the Hardcore brand.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_28: Production of bottled water under the Hardcore brand.
ROADMAP.ROADMAP_ITEM_29: Launch of sports betting agency in the USA.
